subject: Public Speaking
title: Cognitive Dissonance
description: A fast breakdown of Cognitive Dissonance for builders.

hook.text: People hold contradictory beliefs. Pointing that out creates discomfort.

buildup.text: Cognitive dissonance motivates people to change beliefs or behavior.

discovery.text: A skilled speaker creates productive dissonance that drives change.

twist.text: Too much dissonance triggers rejection instead of reflection.

climax.text: The right amount of dissonance opens minds.

punchline.text: Create dissonance carefully. It opens minds.
